page.title: 13THE WEARDALE SHOW 1
page.content:
The Weardale Show is held in St.Johns Chapel on the last Saturday in August every year. It is an agricultural show and a travelling fair comes to St.Johns Chapel at the same time.
In the showfield a large marquee is set up . Inside the tent are displays of flowers, vegetables, jams, cakes, wines, hand made crafts, photographs and work done by the local schools. There is also a place selling beer and other refreshments.
Around the field there are trade stands and pens where farmers show off their best sheep, cattle and goats.
Inside the ring there are show jumping competitions and dog obedience tests.
